/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in a palette of colors that add vibrancy to the scene. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active transportation system. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a common sight in urban landscapes. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
